==Description==
{{Description|An artificed spare clockwork component belonging to Coppelius. It powers this artificed dancer.<br>
The artificed dancer whirls to a platinum tune, performing an unending waltz of icewind. [[Coppelius]]'s dance will not stop. He will continue whirling till the bell tolls.<br>In the original Clockwork Coppelia, Coppelius was the clockwork lady's creator and suitor. These are excerpts from the audience members' recollection:<br>"Mine heart is decided, from today forth, I shall not seek those that make me happy, but bring happiness to those I choose."<br>"This is completely absurd, yet also absurdly commonplace. The wise always take orders from fools, and life is but a vulgar comedy."|[[Archive]]}}
